A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: THE WORST IN THE FRANCHISE!! Give me Jarjar and midichlorines over this crap!  Storyline makes no sense\, completely destroys the entire mythology of the force\, who can use it\, it's powers\, when its used\, etc.  Darth Emo sucks as a villain.   Leia Poppins\, omg.  Fuel supply storyline- let's talk logistics!!!!  And the worst sin of all\, using a line of dialog to invent something (a new technology in this case) in order to cram events to fit the storyline.
